description:
Kuraba Touma is http://anidb.net/ch12345 [Okita Mitsuba]`s fiance. He pretended to ask for her hand in marriage in order to get close to http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] and manipulate them from behind the scene in order to facilitate his own illegal dealings with Joui extremists.
Eliminated by http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita Sougo] in the http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] raid during the military arms transaction with http://anidb.net/ch6222 [Jouishishi] extremists at the harbour.
name: Kuraba Touma
